name: The Bunny Hunt
description:
Halloween. Night. You have the honor of seeing a mystical being commit robbery. It is purely up to you, if it gets out alive or not.

Contains:

- Cats;

- Halloween costumes;

- Mild swearing;

- Flashing images;

- Mild descriptions body horror;

- Non-graphical mentions of death, gunshot wounds.

Made by Jahan Atlas & Devin Katz.

Music used:

I Knew a Guy - Kevin MacLeod

Stardust - JSH

On My Way - Ghostrifer Official

Joy To The World Master - John Bartmann

Calm Down - Rafael Archangel

Additional art by Scott Pakin’s Random Art Generator
